attributes.action: Prove that people are better off on benefits
attributes.additional_details: Time and again, I have read Iain Duncan Smith claiming that benefits recipients are better off financially than those who are lucky enough to be the one in thirty. On this basis, I want to petition the entire Cabinet, including the Prime Minister and his deputy, to become unemployed and live on nothing but 'handouts'. By the way, MP's expenses do not count for this exercise, the Cabinet must learn to survive on the pittance they've condemned others to live on, no more and no less.
